ReportSection.name: IFP Review
ReportSection.Instructions:
1. When scoring the candidate please consider the level of funding the candidate is applying for and provide scores appropriate to their stage of development.
  2. Candidates should be scored on five main criteria:
    1. Relevant and alignment between proposed project and TVNâ€™s strategic priorities (Application Form Section 2: Personal Research Project)
    2. Motivation to participate in Interdisciplinary Fellowship Program (Application Form Section 3: Interest and Benefit, CV)
    3. Aptitude and capacity to: (Application Form Section 2.3: Scientific Excellence of Project, CV, Capacity Disclosure Form)
      1. Develop expertise on frailty and late life issues
      2. Understand interdisciplinary perspectives and collaborative practice
      3. Develop skills necessary to be successful in professional settings
    4. Supervisor Support (Supervisor Endorsement Form)
    5. Referee Endorsement (Reference Letters)
